channel.title: Need 317 Coder - Good idea!
channel.description:
I want to make a 317 F2P Pk server. There will be no members items, just the old style F2P items. The server will be based around Pking.
I dont just want a coder whos just going to download a source. I need an original server. So i want a coder who can make a very simple source.
I can host, i can make forums, i can make a client.
Whats in it for you? well you will be given "owner" status on a server which i hope will be very successfull and have lots of players!
The reason i want a F2P server is because theyre arent many F2P servers and i dont really like P2P pking because all you do it spec and die.
The idea is in early stages and i will give more detail on MSN. My MSN: Billythebest123@hotmail.co.uk
Thanks -Billy

item.title: Need 317 Coder - Good idea!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

it brakes section rule one

  1. All topics in this section must be requests for help on a server. Any non-server related question will be locked. Requesting a hoster, coder, or asking about a VPS also falls under being non-server related.

you may want to read them here http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php
/topic,331370.0.html

[quote=“billythebest123, post:4, topic:317533”]Ok, where can i request a coder??[/quote]i don’t think you can on this forum but you could ask a mod to see if im right

Read full topic
